Animation

Animation can be added to images and frames of content. Scroll down to page to see the different animations available.

Drop in

Pop

Slide left

Slide right

Colour fade-in

Auto-replay

Animations will replay by default if you scroll away from the animation and come back to it. Try it out by scrolling down the page and moving back up again.
